document_data.name: Lutzaen's Frequent Jaunt
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lutzaen's frequent jaunt''''' was a teleportation [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell acted exactly as the ''[[dimension door]]'' spell, but only over short distances. The spell was able to teleport the caster over a distance of {{SI|25|ft|long=yes}} or less. This distance grew as the caster's skill level increased.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[verbal component]].
